name: Chi's Adventure
description:
On a windy day, Chi is so hungry but as she saw a tree with many nests, she simply can't resist those delicious snacks. Using her power of spontaneous combustion, help her fight against the evil wind while walking towards those snacks!

Submission for the 3rd Hannover Game Jam with the theme "Hochmut kommt vor dem Fall" (Eng: Pride comes before the fall).

How to play

Hold Space: Charging Chi's power for the jump

A, D or Left, Right Arrow: Balance Chi as she walks
